Articles.Content: So yeah when I asked nicely you ppl helped me. I need an,gameboy advance emulator for ANDROID with ability to connect using the Bluetooth to a friend with the emu and play with him the game (I think its gamepak emulation or how you call the thing wich you use to connect the GBAs together) has to work on Android gingerbread thx much

Gameboid is generally considered the best one, it's what I use, it works brilliantly. I don't know about Gingerbread compatibility, you'll have to look that up, since I'm running Icecream Sandwich. As for the bluetooth thing, it just can't be done at the moment on android, none of the available GBA emulators have bluetooth functionality yet, sorry.
